conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation confirmed with visible depth and isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent structural translation; wall thickness and floor planes are handled with high clarity.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is strong. Small inaccuracies in wall lengths in the bedroom wings and additional kitchen-like fixtures not in original plan.

interior_elements.notes: Most furniture (beds, sofas) placed correctly. Some hall spaces populated with cabinets/kitchenettes not found in 2D.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Score slightly impacted by floating 'text' labels on some 3D countertops.

detected_errors.description: Hallway/recess area converted into a kitchen/countertop space not present in 2D.
Text-like artifacts visible on the top of some 3D surfaces.

summary: A high-quality 3D conversion that maintains core structural integrity despite adding some unauthorized interior furnishings.
